title: 84: Diet Culture Sucks! ft. Sarah Nicole Landry (aka The Birds Papaya)
itunes:title: 84: Diet Culture Sucks! ft. Sarah Nicole Landry (aka The Birds Papaya)
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: Disordered eating and body dysmorphia is discussed) The Broads are joined by the amazing and inspirational Sarah Nicole Landry of The Birds Papaya! They discuss their different journeys with their own bodies, struggles with self love and BODY LOVE, diet culture, fat phobia, learning about the necessity to always be learning, and much more! 
You can follow Sarah at @thebirdspapaya and listen to her podcast @thepapayapodcast here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-papaya-podcast/id1469615517
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS:

*** YOUR SUPER: Get 15% off your order when you use code CHATTY at checkout by going to yoursuper.com (http://yoursuper.com/)
